Method Detail

exportObject

public void exportObject(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                         IdManager idManager,
                         org.iviPro.model.Project project,
                         java.util.Set<org.iviPro.model.IAbstractBean> alreadyExported)
                  throws ExportException
Processes the given model data object and exports it into the given document.

Parameters:
exportObj - The model object to be exported. This object must be of the same type as the getExportObjectType() method returns.
doc - The document that should be updated with the information of the exported object.
idManager - The ID-Manager that should be used to generate IDs of the elements
project - The project that the exported object belongs to.
alreadyExported - Set of already exported objects. These should not be exported again.
Throws:
ExportException - If an error occurs while exporting this object.
